name: Create Bidsketch proposals from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new proposal in Bidsketch. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Sva3mHegnbwOIUZK_4y9zB6BjR0p0lTHlOq1WNifJI4/edit?usp=sharing).
